languages.text: "Вздумала судить меня?" {n}Ризза выхватывает амулет с клыкастой мордой и венцом рогов. Она нехорошо ухмыляется.{/n} "Не стоило этого делать, ведь у меня есть козырь на крайний случай. Я, Ризза, не признаю твое проклятое правосудие и твоего проклятого Императора! Я заключаю сделку, что была предложена, и отдаюсь во власть Предела рассвета! Умри, рыжая тварь!" {n}Клыкастая морда распахивает пасть и, взревев, испускает в Инцендию пламенную стрелу.{/n}

"You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вздумала судить меня?" {n}Ризза выхватывает амулет с клыкастой мордой и венцом рогов. Она нехорошо ухмыляется.{/n} "Не стоило этого делать, ведь у меня есть козырь на крайний случай. Я, Ризза, не признаю твое проклятое правосудие и твоего проклятого Императора! Я заключаю сделку, что была предложена, и отдаюсь во власть Предела рассвета! Умри, рыжая тварь!" {n}Клыкастая морда распахивает пасть и, взревев, испускает в Инцендию пламенную стрелу.{/n}

I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst comes to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! languages.text: “你以为你有权审判我吗？”{n}莱萨拿出一枚护身符，上面刻着一个长着犄角与獠牙的兽头，脸上露出了不祥的笑容。{/n}“你们真不该这么做。这是我最后的底牌，但到了生死关头，我也只能用了。我，莱萨，我鄙夷你们该死的正义与该死的帝皇！我愿意接受你们开出来的条件，我愿意侍奉破晓锋刃！死吧，你这个红头发的臭婊子！”{n}兽头张开了嘴，咆哮起来，朝因森蒂娅吐出了一支熊熊燃烧的利箭。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你以为你有权审判我吗？”{n}莱萨拿出一枚护身符，上面刻着一个长着犄角与獠牙的兽头，脸上露出了不祥的笑容。{/n}“你们可真不该这么做。我还有最后的底牌，但到了生死关头，也只能用了。我，莱萨，我鄙夷你们该死的正义与该死的帝皇！我愿意接受你们开出来的条件，我愿意侍奉破晓锋刃！死吧，你这个红头发的臭婊子！”{n}兽头张开了嘴，咆哮起来，朝因森蒂娅吐出了一支熊熊燃烧的利箭。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「お前は私を裁ける立場か？」{n}リザは牙の生えた獣の頭のお守りを素早く手に取ると、不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前はやるべきではなかった。私はもしもの時を思って袖に隠しているものがある。私、リザは、お前の呪われた正義と呪われた皇帝を拒否する！提示された取引を受け入れ、暁の刃に身を委ねる！死ね、この赤毛の怪物が！」{n}怪物のお守りが口を開き、インセンディアに向かって燃える矢を吐き出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は私を裁ける立場か？」{n}リザは牙の生えた獣の頭のお守りを素早く手に取ると、不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前はやるべきではなかった。私はもしもの時を思って袖に隠しているものがある。私、リザは、お前の呪われた正義と呪われた皇帝を拒否する！提示された取引を受け入れ、暁の刃に身を委ねる！死ね、この赤毛の怪物が！」{n}怪物のお守りが口を開き、インセンディアに向かって燃える矢を吐き出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «¿Cree que puede juzgarme?». {n}Ryzza saca un amuleto con la cabeza de una bestia con colmillos coronada por cuernos. Sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «No debería haber hecho eso. Siempre me reservo algo por si las cosas van mal. ¡Yo, Ryzza, rechazo su maldita justicia y a su maldito Emperador! ¡Acepto el trato que se me ofreció y me entrego al Filo del Amanecer! ¡Muere, monstruo pelirrojo!». {n}La cabeza abre la boca, ruge y escupe una flecha con fuego hacia Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que puede juzgarme?». {n}Ryzza saca un amuleto con la cabeza de una bestia con colmillos coronada por cuernos. Sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «No debería haber hecho eso. Siempre me reservo algo por si las cosas van mal. ¡Yo, Ryzza, rechazo su maldita justicia y a su maldito Emperador! ¡Acepto el trato que se me ofreció y me entrego al Filo del Amanecer! ¡Muere, monstruo pelirrojo!». {n}La cabeza abre la boca, ruge y escupe una flecha con fuego hacia Incendia.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könnt über mich urteilen?" {n}Ryzza zieht blitzschnell ein Amulett heraus. Es ist ein Tierkopf mit scharfen Zähnen und spitzen Hörnern. Sie grinst bedrohlich.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ich habe etwas im Ärmel, für den Fall, dass es hart auf hart kommt. Ich, Ryzza, lehne Eure verfluchte Gerechtigkeit und Euren verfluchten Imperator ab! Ich akzeptiere den Handel, der mir angeboten wurde, und ergebe mich dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs! Sterbt, Ihr rothaariges Monster!" {n}Der Kopf mit den vielen Zähnen reißt den Mund auf, brüllt und speit einen flammenden Pfeil auf Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könnt über mich urteilen?" {n}Ryzza zieht blitzschnell ein Amulett heraus. Es ist ein Tierkopf mit scharfen Zähnen und spitzen Hörnern. Sie grinst bedrohlich.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ich habe etwas im Ärmel, für den Fall, dass es hart auf hart kommt. Ich, Ryzza, lehne Eure verfluchte Gerechtigkeit und Euren verfluchten Imperator ab! Ich akzeptiere den Handel, der mir angeboten wurde, und ergebe mich dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs! Sterbt, rothaariges Monster!" {n}Der Kopf mit den vielen Zähnen reißt den Mund auf, brüllt und speit einen flammenden Pfeil auf Incendia.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? » {n}Avec un sourire menaçant, Ryzza sort une amulette représentant la tête d'une bête à crocs couronnée d'épines.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. J'avais encore une carte dans ma manche, au cas où la situation tournerait mal. Moi, Ryzza, je renie votre prétendue justice et votre Empereur maudit ! J'accepte la proposition qui m'a été faite en m'offrant à la Lame de l'Aube ! Crève, sorcière ! » {n}La tête de l'amulette ouvre la gueule, rugit et crache un jet de flammes sur Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? » {n}Avec un sourire menaçant, Ryzza sort une amulette représentant la tête d'une bête à crocs couronnée d'épines.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. J'avais encore une carte dans ma manche, au cas où la situation tournerait mal. Moi, Ryzza, je renie votre prétendue justice et votre Empereur maudit ! J'accepte la proposition qui m'a été faite en m'offrant à la Lame de l'Aube ! Crève, sorcière ! » {n}La tête de l'amulette ouvre la gueule, rugit et crache un jet de flammes sur Incendia.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Beni yargılayabileceğinizi mi düşünüyorsunuz?" {n}Sivri dişli ve boynuzlu bir hayvanın resmedildiği bir kolye çıkaran Ryzza, esrarlı bir edayla sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Yumurta kapıya dayandığında kullanmak üzere sakladığım bir silahım daha var. Ben Ryzza, sizin lanet adaletinizi de lanet İmparator'unuzu da reddediyorum! Bana teklif edilen anlaşmayı kabul ediyorum ve kendimi Tan Vakti'ne teslim ediyorum! Geber seni kızıl kafalı canavar!" {n}Hayvan başı ağzını açıyor, kükrüyor ve yanan bir ok fırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She grins ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, you redheaded monster!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits out a flaming arrow at Incendia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni yargılayabileceğinizi mi düşünüyorsunuz?" {n}Ryzza, sivri dişli ve boynuzlu bir hayvanın resmedildiği bir kolye çıkarıyor, esrarlı bir edayla sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Yumurta kapıya dayandığında kullanmak üzere sakladığım bir silahım daha var. Ben, Ryzza, sizin lanetli adaletinizi de, lanetli İmparator'unuzu da reddediyorum! Bana teklif edilen anlaşmayı kabul ediyorum ve kendimi Tan Vakti'ne teslim ediyorum! Geber seni kızıl kafalı canavar!" {n}Hayvan başı ağzını açıyor, kükrüyor ve İncendia'ya yanan bir ok tükürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
